description: Airing on December 19, 2014: Will the unprecedented Sony hack set off an arms race among hackers to one up the North Koreans? Plus, we talk with Jonathan Zittrain, law professor and co-founder of Harvard’s Berkman Center for Internet and Society, about legal issues underlying the Sony hack. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? It's time for Silicon Tally! This week, digital dating consultant Laurie Davis.
title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, December 19, 2014
